org.opentcs.access.rmi.services

接口 RemoteKernelServicePortal

  • 所有超级接口:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface RemoteKernelServicePortal
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Declares the methods provided by the KernelServicePortal via RMI.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.lang.String GUEST_PASSWORD
      已过时。 
      In the future, user credentials will be part of the applications, not the API.
      static java.lang.String GUEST_USER
      已过时。 
      In the future, user credentials will be part of the applications, not the API.

    • 字段详细资料

      • GUEST_USER

        @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Will be removed.")
static final java.lang.String GUEST_USER
        已过时。 In the future, user credentials will be part of the applications, not the API.
        The default/guest user name.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • GUEST_PASSWORD

        @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Will be removed.")
static final java.lang.String GUEST_PASSWORD
        已过时。 In the future, user credentials will be part of the applications, not the API.
        The default/guest password.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • login

        ClientID login(java.lang.String userName,
               java.lang.String password,
               java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.Object> eventFilter)
        throws CredentialsException,
               java.rmi.RemoteException
        Introduce the calling client to the server and authenticate for operations.
        参数:
        userName - The user's name.
        password - The user's password.
        eventFilter - The event filter to be applied to events on the server side.
        返回:
        An identification object that is required for subsequent method calls.
        抛出:
        CredentialsException - If authentication with the given username and password failed.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If there was an RMI-related problem.

      • logout

        void logout(ClientID clientId)
     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        抛出:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
